entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
